graph.original_query: Create a modern web application with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that includes responsive design and interactive features

T001.initial_thoughts: I need to create the basic project structure, which includes creating three files: index.html, styles.css, and script.js. I'll use the `files` output to create these files with their initial content, including placeholders for future updates. Also, I'll include the required Tailwind CSS and Lucide Icons CDNs.

files.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Modern Web Application</title>
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.min.js"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-100 font-roboto">
    <!-- HEADER_START --><!-- HEADER_END -->

    <main class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
        <!-- HERO_SECTION_START --><!-- HERO_SECTION_END -->

        <!-- CONTENT_SECTION_START --><!-- CONTENT_SECTION_END -->

        <!-- FOOTER_START --><!-- FOOTER_END -->
    </main>

    <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

nodes.description: Set up the basic project structure, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript file organization.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create the initial project structure for a modern web application, including separate folders for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. Create an index.html file with basic HTML structure. Create a styles.css file with reset CSS, and a script.js file. Make sure to leave placeholders to update in the future calls. Add comments to mark future update points.

output.initial_thoughts: I need to create the basic project structure, which includes creating three files: index.html, styles.css, and script.js. I'll use the `files` output to create these files with their initial content, including placeholders for future updates. Also, I'll include the required Tailwind CSS and Lucide Icons CDNs.

files.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Modern Web Application</title>
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.min.js"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-100 font-roboto">
    <!-- HEADER_START --><!-- HEADER_END -->

    <main class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
        <!-- HERO_SECTION_START --><!-- HERO_SECTION_END -->

        <!-- CONTENT_SECTION_START --><!-- CONTENT_SECTION_END -->

        <!-- FOOTER_START --><!-- FOOTER_END -->
    </main>

    <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

nodes.description: Define the base theme and overall design for the web application, focusing on modern aesthetics and responsive design principles.
nodes.agent_prompt: Define the base theme and design for the web application in styles.css. Focus on modern aesthetics and responsive design principles using CSS grid and flexbox. Ensure the design is adaptable to different screen sizes. Add CSS variables for consistent styling. Leave placeholders for future updates. Read T001 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Implement the main layout and navigation structure using HTML and CSS, ensuring it is responsive and user-friendly.
nodes.agent_prompt: Implement the main layout and navigation structure in index.html using HTML5 semantic elements. Ensure the layout is responsive using media queries in styles.css. Create a header, main content area, and footer. Add a navigation bar with links to different sections of the application. Read T001 and T002 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Develop interactive features using JavaScript, such as event listeners and DOM manipulation, to enhance user engagement.
nodes.agent_prompt: Develop interactive features using JavaScript in script.js. Add event listeners to handle user interactions, such as button clicks and form submissions. Use DOM manipulation to update the content dynamically. Implement features like a modal window or a collapsible menu. Read T001 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Add a contact form with validation and submission handling using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a contact form to the index.html file with fields for name, email, and message. Implement form validation using JavaScript in script.js to ensure all fields are filled correctly. Use CSS in styles.css to style the form and error messages. Handle form submission using JavaScript to prevent page reload. Read T001, T002, and T004 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Implement a responsive image gallery using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing different images or projects.
nodes.agent_prompt: Implement a responsive image gallery in index.html using HTML5 figure and figcaption elements. Use CSS in styles.css to style the gallery and make it responsive. Add JavaScript in script.js to handle image transitions and display larger versions of the images. Read T001, T002, and T004 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Create an 'About Us' page with detailed information about the company or organization using HTML and CSS.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create an 'About Us' page with detailed information about the company or organization in a new about.html file. Use HTML5 semantic elements to structure the content. Use CSS in styles.css to style the page and make it visually appealing. Ensure the page is responsive. Read T001 and T002 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Implement a blog section with multiple blog posts using HTML and CSS.
nodes.agent_prompt: Implement a blog section with multiple blog posts. Create separate HTML files for each blog post, such as blog1.html, blog2.html, etc. Use CSS in styles.css to style the blog posts and the blog section in index.html. Ensure the blog section is responsive. Read T001 and T002 to use the existing files.

nodes.description: Distill the code and summarize the structure of the web application.
nodes.agent_prompt: Examine the code files generated in previous steps (T001, T002, T003, T004, T005, T006, T007, T008). Summarize the structure of the web application, including the purpose of each file and the overall architecture.
